title: Bazooka Candy Brands Variety Summer Candy Box - 18 Count Lollipops w/ Assorted Flavors from Ring Pop, Push Pop, Baby Bottle Pop & Juicy Drop - Fun Candy for Summer Parties - 12.4 Ounce (Pack of 1)
description:
About this item
BULK SUMMER CANDY BOX: 18 Count candy box contains 6 Ring Pop, 4 Push Pop, 4 Baby Bottle Pop, and 4 Juicy Drop Lollipops.
SUMMER TREATS: Great for kids' party favors, Bachelorette party accessories, 4th of July snacks, or just a fun and sweet summer treat.
ASSORTED CANDY FLAVORS: Contains a selection of mouth-watering fruity flavors including Strawberry (all), Blue Raspberry (all), Fruit Punch (BBP+JD), Watermelon (RP), and Wild cherry Berry (JD), so everyone can have their favorite this summer.
SUMMER VARIETY PARTY PACK: Bazooka Candy Brands variety lollipops in bulk make deliciously fun treats for kids. The perfect treats to share, use it as party favors or a gift for your next pool party.
SHELF-STABLE TREATS: Perfect treats to have around the house for kids and the whole family to enjoy. Or give as a candy gift in a care package because everyone loves Ring Pop, Push Pop, Baby Bottle Pop, and Juicy Drop.

reviews.name: Nea2p
reviews.review: 4 juicy drop pops, 4 baby bottle pops, 4 push pops and 6 ring pops! This is great cause it will last a while! With so many choices! Bought this cause it‚Äôs cheaper than buying individually so 2 thumbs up from me!

reviews.name: E_Wagner
reviews.review:
I didn't even have a chance to even think about taking a picture if I had wanted to LOL!! As soon as my kids saw this they were ecstatic!!! Immediately asked if they could open it! Considering each of these candies (except ring pops) go for 2 bucks at the convenience store, the price was definitely worth it, not to mention my kids faces when they opened the package LOL!!

With Covid-19 going on, I was NOT risking my family being around strangers, and so many people especially (most not taking proper precautions)... So we decided to celebrate at home doing fun family things like making up halloween games and I just bought them a bunch of candy so at least that was one halloween tradition. Out of ALL the candy I bought, this was sooooo a favorite by ALL THREE!! Yes 3 kids all agree on something lol, and it's not often that happens :)

Hope everyone had a SAFE and FUN Happy Halloween :D

reviews.name: Hesteen
reviews.reviewTitle: As described but with less flavor variety.
reviews.review:
Item as described, for the most part. The product was fresh, a good price and shipped quickly and safely. The only downfall was that there was not as much variety in the flavors as shown in picture. This was not enough of a disappointment to remove a star.

My box contained: 6 ring pops (3 strawberry, 2 blue raspberry, 1 watermelon); 4 push pops (2 strawberry, 1 blue raspberry, 1 cotton candy); 4 baby bottle pops (1 unicorn, 1 watermelon, 2 strawberry); 4 juice pops (1 watermelon, 2 punch and 1 blue raspberry).

reviews.name: Kevin Hansen
reviews.review: very good suckers great price too

reviews.name: Brandi Pearl
reviews.review: I love these, especially Push Pop and Baby Bottle Pop, so it is nice to be able to get them in a variety pack together, especially with other products I enjoy. Great value for the money!

reviews.name: Living That Blessed Life
reviews.review: I have 4 kids, and anytime we go to a little store the kids always want to purchase a baby bottle pop or ring pop etc, and they totally rip you off and jack the prices up at the store lol so this was a steal of a deal to keep on hand at home

reviews.name: theofficefan
reviews.review: I wanted to buy my niece a box of candy and this was cheaper and looked nicer than buying everything separately and putting it together myself. Everything was intact and as expected.

reviews.name: Delilah
reviews.review: I gave these away for Halloween I got a bunch of boxes and the kids loved them it was a big hit!

title: Butterfly Cell Phone Ring Holder, 360¬∞Rotation Phone Ring Grip, Compatible with iPhone, Samsung Galaxy, LG Google Pixel, iPad, Rhinestones and Enamel (Rose Gold and White)
description:
About this item
This cell phone ring holder finger stand is suitable for all kinds of phones. The phone ring can be rotated and flipped 360 degrees to achieve personalized usability, which is convenient for you to watch movies, TV shows, video etc.
The finger ring kickstand is made of high-quality alloy and stainless steel with 5 layers coating. The finger ring holder grip stand with rhinestones and enamel process are elegant and amazingly sparkly!
The beautiful butterfly phone ring holder provides you with a unique ring stand to make your phone more beautiful.
The sturdy sticker enhances the adsorption force and prevents the device from accidentally falling and slipping. Note: Please do not use the phone ring kickstand within 24 hours after installation.
Worryfree Service: All phone ring holder have been 100% QC tested. You‚Äôll get a 30 Days 100% money back guarantee and lifetime replacement warranty if damage occurs. What you get: ring holder*1, 3M tapes*3, PE film*3, instructions*1, scratch cards*1, phone buckle*1.

reviews.name: paul thomas
reviews.reviewTitle: Good value. Is Sturdy and attractive. Adhesive seems to be good so fR.
reviews.review: Attractive, sturdy, adhesion seems to be good.

reviews.name: Jlca
reviews.review: I used liquid adhesion on this to ensure it doesn't come off. Those using this as a phone stand are the ones with the negative reviews. I use this as I have anxiety and need my phone attached to my hands some how. It does it's job and it's BEAUTIFUL and sturdy. Like I said I used another adhesion as I didn't trust the product on its own considering it's going to be used constantly but all in all 10/10

reviews.name: JennyR
reviews.review: I was worried because my phone cover is a gel back with glitter inside, and this said it wouldn't work well. But so far it's doing great. So if you use it properly, it should be even better!

reviews.name: Mary
reviews.review: I love this ring holder thingymabob. It looks so pretty on my butterfly phone case. So sturdy and easy to put on. This ring adheres to my case so good I don't have to worry about it coming off any time soon. Tks

reviews.name: Robert
reviews.review: It was easy to put on my case, its comfortable to hold, and it seems to be very sturdy! The butterfly is so beautiful in person. 10/10.

reviews.name: Jackie Willen
reviews.review: The ring folds down so I can put it in my purse/pocket, embellishment is flat enough that it fits easily in my hand. I get lots of compliments on it. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: 20critters
reviews.review: Pretty, convenient, eaiser to hold phone at times seeing I have tendonitis and can not always open my fingers all the way to hold the phone, also great for propping up on a table to watch a video clip.

reviews.name: murrie56
reviews.reviewTitle: I Absolutely LOVE This Butterfly Ring!!
reviews.review: It says not to put it on a silicone case. I did, & it's fine so far. It looks beautiful on my rose gold Glitter case! It dresses the case up so nice! Plus, I use it for a stand. I wish I could take a picture of it! I would recommend this for sure!

title: Three Pack-Ring Phone Holder Bracket Stand Kickstand for Smartphones,Tablets,Pads-Mandala Flower
description:
About this item
Three Pieces
Metal Ring + 3M adhesive
Compatible with most cellphones such as iPhones,Samsung, and Other Smartphones
Providing all around protection for your phone and preventing your phone case from the daily damage and scratches
100% quality guarantee.We would serve you with all our hearts.

reviews.name: Heather
reviews.reviewTitle: Rotate the ring until the adhesive gums up in the middle, peel off that blob, THEN stick it
reviews.review:
First one came off in a day. Looking at the adhesive after it came off, it goes over where the ring rotates in the middle. So, when you turn the ring the adhesive bunches up and the ring comes unstuck.

Put a second one on, and same thing. However, this time I caught it before too much gunk made the adhesive no longer sticky and peeled out the little glob of adhesive in the middle over where the ring attaches. I stuck it back on, and there it has stayed ever since.

If you buy these, make sure you rotate the ring until the adhesive gums up in the middle, peel off that glob, AND THEN stick it on your phone/case. Otherwise it will just come off.

Overall, the rings are pretty and sturdy!

reviews.name: Lori R
reviews.review: Though there were several substandard reviews on this product, I purchased it anyway because I liked the mandala design and also because the ring has a flat side which I wanted so it could be used as a stand (wasn't sure how well the round rings would support my Pixel 3XL phone). I received all 3 designs as described by the seller. I've had no issues with adherence. You do need to press firmly and allow it to "cure" before much use. The ring is stiff at first use, but over time it becomes easier to adjust. If it was real loose and easy to adjust, the kickstand would not work properly. I'm happy I purchased this product - it works as described.

reviews.name: Chris Orr
reviews.review: I have used pop socket after pop socket on my phone and they only last about a month or two before breaking. This popped up as I was looking at some pop sockets...I didn't even know ring phone holders existed...(although I did see one on a phone, but I had no clue what it was lol)....anyway I've only used one out of this pack and this applied to my phone case perfectly, and it was a little struggle to get used to, but wow it's so much nicer and doesn't ever hurt using this ring holder....my only negative is, when I talk on the phone my hair gets caught somewhere in the ring holder and no matter how I try to turn it to free my hair, I always have to break my hair off...other than that I recommend this product.

reviews.name: Gabriella
reviews.review: They're sturdy, not bulky, and they work even better than pop sockets. Glad I bought them

reviews.name: PurpleHippo
reviews.reviewTitle: Best Impulse Buy in a While
reviews.review: I was on the fence if I wanted one of these for my phone because it would change the profile. And I didn't think I would use it much because I don't watch TV or prop my phone up much. Turns out these are fantastic. I end up using it the hold the phone all the time and not worry about dropping it. I am super clumsy so this is great. The designs are really cute too.

reviews.name: S. Smoter
reviews.review: I can't live without a ring-type phone grip - it's like having a third hand. Seriously, I use this to attach the phone to my car's dash so I can see the nav app easily, plus my phone doesn't get lost. I frequently use the ring as a stand to watch videos. I am always depending on the ring to ensure I don't throw my phone while walking the dog (he always jerks the leash). And, this ring let's me carrying my phone and lot's of packages into the house at one time. I love this! And, this products comes in many cool designs and colors. You won't be sorry! Then, add in you get 3 for the price of 1, and this is so great!

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.review: I got this almost a year ago and it hasn‚Äôt BUDGED. I‚Äôve only used one and gave the other two to friends, because again I only needed the one because it works so well. These are so much less expensive than those dumb pop sockets and SO much more useful! I‚Äôve had similar ones by a different brand in the past and the hinge had gotten loose, but this one is working like the day I got it! And I have a red phone and a clear case and it looks SO cute. Identical to the description pictures. I used a random mirror selfie from when I was comparing my phone Look to my friend‚Äôs. I don‚Äôt know how I would hold my phone without this!

reviews.name: Steven P. Spinella
reviews.review:
If you like sliding your phone in a back pocket with nothing protruding, this is not for you. However, "there is another..." Some people, perhaps mainly women, like to keep their phones in purses, backpacks, and leave them laying around. They worry about them falling to the ground, hitting the pavement while they're out walking, and cracking the screen (twice in 3 months, no kidding!). They even like to prop them up on the table, either vertically or horizontally. These are the people of the ring.
If you are one of these, or want to join their tribe, you will love this ring. It has attached itself firmly to the TPU case and not budged since, "we" have now gone several months without dropping said phone, "we" enjoy slipping our cute little finger through the ring so we can hold it more securely, and "we" think it looks cute.
Oh, if you are into wireless charging, this may not be for you. The phone will still charge wirelessly if I pull the case off. (We have attached the ring to the case, not the phone, although both are possible.) Since the ring sits right on top of the wireless charging spot on the back of the phone, you probably already knew you couldn't do both at the same time.

title: MINDSKY Phone Ring Holder Finger Kickstand Retractable 360¬∞Rotation Ultra-Thin Cell Phone Back Grip Foldable Cellphone Stand for iPhone iPad Smartphones Tablets ( with Universal Magnetic Car Mount)
description:
About this item
„ÄêRing Grip and Table Stand 2in1„ÄëDouble folded design provides infinite possibilities. The ring grip can perfectly adapt to various occasions, prevent your phone slipping from your hands on crowded bus and subways. Secure your phone for walking, traveling, hiking, playing game, selfies by one hand. Also a perfect solution to place your smartphone on office desk, kitchen counter or bedside table.
„ÄêFlexible Multi-Angle Design„Äë 360¬∞ Rotation and 2 adjustable arms make it more convenient to provide you more viewing angles than any other cell phone ring holder or phone stand. The phone finger ring is tested to withstand 10000 times of folding without getting loose.
„ÄêPremium Material„ÄëThe phone kickstand is made of high quality zinc alloy metal material, features its ultra-durability that keeps fresh and unfading colors as new even after using for a long time. With powerful and sticky 3M tape attaching well to smartphones, tablets, kindles and switch lite. We will provide an electrostatic disc, help to stick firmly on smooth plastic, TPU, metal or most phone /phone case. It will NOT stick to fabric, glass, liquid silicone or non-flat textured surfaces.
„ÄêGrip+Magnetic Mount Combination Set„ÄëThe package includes a cell phone ring holder and a magnetic car phone mount. This powerful magnetic phone holder is compatible with various car models and can also be used in kitchens, offices, cabinets and other scenarios. You can simply attach or remove your phone with one hand and prevent the mobile phone from falling off when driving on a rugged mountain road.
„ÄêNO WORRIES„ÄëIf there are any quality issues with this smartphone kickstand, please don't worry. We will provide 24h*7day timely customer service to solve the problem better. If you don't like the phone grip for whatever reason, we'll refund you or replace it.

reviews.name: Saphiya
reviews.reviewTitle: Fantastic kickstand for my Samsung Galaxy Z Fold2!
reviews.review: I don't write reviews but I had to express how much I love this kickstand! I have the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold2. I truly love my device but it is heavy, add in the case, and it's even heavier, and bulky. I read a lot on my phone, but my hands do start to hurt from holding it. This kickstand has exceeded my expectations. Being able to use the kickstand for both the front screen and the larger inner screen at multiple angles has been a dream! I read at one angle, watch videos at another angle, and it's always perfect. It's only been a few days but even if the adhesive were to come off I'd reorder a replacement or find some other adhesive just to keep using the kickstand. Sooo happy with this purchase!

reviews.name: H. Merdian
reviews.reviewTitle: Company contact info invalid! Loose swivel after 2 months
reviews.review: I loved the stand when I first got it, but after only 2 months, the swivel became very loose. The phone no longer stays in position. So I tried to email the mindsky_service@gmail.com like the instruction pamphlet indicated. I immediately received a failure notice indicating that email address does not exist. I also tried going to the www.mindskytech.com, via the QR code on the instruction pamphlet, and my phone notified me that my "connection is not private"..."attackers might be trying to steal my info..." so I am at an impasse. I do not recommend this company or this product. I gave this product 1 star for that reason. Had they been easy to contact regarding a replacement/troubleshooting, this review would not have been necessary.

reviews.name: C. Garcia or D. Maez
reviews.reviewTitle: SO MANY WAYS TO USE IT!!!
reviews.review: ¬†I have to admit when I first got this thing I was thinking hmmm a little big but then realized it was amazing after putting it on my phone (iPhone Mini) with Pelican Shield case. There are so many uses for this thing its crazy and it looks so good and is so handy I will probably buy some more for other people as well! It‚Äôs a permanent stand for your phone and has great height. It's totally adjustable so you can put your phone in landscape or simply turn it into portrait mode. You can hang your phone on things and it folds up so nice and neat on your phone and is thin enough you forget it‚Äôs there. Also if you have a smaller phone (like the iphone mini) and sometimes your fingers get in the way when taking pictures this thing is also perfect for that as you can just use this thing to grab and take pictures no problem. I would recommend this to just anybody. It really amazing.

reviews.name: Erica Takaesu
reviews.review:
This is by far the BEST phone stand ever!! It‚Äôs so universal. I can make my phone sit either vertical or horizontal or extend it out as a short selfie stick. It‚Äôs a life saver for keeping my phone propped up for my kids.
So far the adhesion is doing what it‚Äôs supposed to do. No sign of it coming off my phone case.
I previously had a pop socket so getting used to holding the phone with this stand takes some getting use to. Its definitely something I would recommend!!

reviews.name: Sue
reviews.review: A friend recommended this holder, so I figured I will give a try. It turns out this holder is quite handy. It is 360 rotational, allows me to watch shows at different eye level. I used the protector shield sticker on the back of the phone with the holder, so far so good.

reviews.name: Maia
reviews.reviewTitle: Ring too large to hold with one finger. Adhesive super sticky.
reviews.review: I love how it stands up high so you can watch shows on your cell without straining your neck. The only issue I had was the ring part was too big to hold the phone with one hand. That‚Äôs the purpose of the ring holder for me is to be able to slip my finger through and hold it with one hand. The packaging was very nice and there was a lot of extras in it. Very sturdy adhesion. Would recommend if you're ok with the large ring holder.

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.review: I had the pop-up kind of holder and regular ring holder. But you can't stand the phone up vertically with those. I also have a magnetic holder in my car, which I personally have found to work better than the bracket kind. This items resolves all issues. I can stand the phone either way, and use it with my magnetic holder. I comes with a magnetic holder, which I can use elsewhere.

reviews.name: Danny
reviews.review: The versatility of this grip + stand is amazing. I was a bit worried about using this with my Pixel 3XL as it has a glass back, but I don't seem to have any issues with adhesion so far. I love how I can put my phone into different positions with various angles. It is also sturdy enough to hold the position very well. I haven't used the magnetic strip yet, but the strength seems to be plenty for mounting the phone to any surface. The only downside is that the grip is a bit awkward at times due to the oval shape, but the versatility of the stand function more than compensates for it. Overall very happy with the product!

reviews.name: King111
reviews.reviewTitle: Would be great, but sticky patch doesn‚Äôt hold.
reviews.review:
I received this a week ago and initially was raving about it, telling all my family they should get one. It transforms the phone by adding a sturdy but lightweight stand that can be put on any position or attached magnetically to a base magnet you can stick on car dashboard. It is compact enough to to fold flat and not take up much space on your phone cover, but extends to create a really useful stand so you can make your phone independent at any angle. I have used phone rings for years so am a big fan and this is definitely the most versatile and the most useful.

However this morning the ring came off my phone when the phone got a sideways knock... it was the clear sticky pad that sticks to the case that came off, even thought it initially stuck on very well. I will add that no phone ring I have ever used has come off my phone - I‚Äôve literally had to yank them off if I needed to change to another.

I have discovered that once this sticky patch comes off, it then continues to do so... it has since come off three more times today, and I guess it will soon become non sticky and therefore useless.

I hope the seller will send me a new sticky patch as it is the fail point. Interestingly the box includes a few extra of the small stickie patches used to stick the stand to the large sticky patch... why are there no more replacements for the large a s most important patch - the one that stocks the gadget to your phone case? I may try sticking it on with super glue... but it may not work, in that case I will have to return it. For such a seemingly great product to fail after just two days is a huge disappointment. And other buyers have reported the same issue.

It will be interesting to see how the seller responds and if they have a solution, as apart form this key issue, the phone ring holder would be excellent, and I am so disappointed to be writing a negative review.

reviews.name: Ms Millward
reviews.review:
This could be a great item but sadly after just a month it has gone limp and spins freely meaning I can't use it to hold up my phone anymore

Update: a week later the handle came off its hooks. I was able to use it a bit by reattaching but it'd come off intermitterntly

Update again: another week on and the whole thing has come apart at the adhesive. Very unimpressed

reviews.name: Twinkle_Toes
reviews.review:
Received mine 22 June and it had been working great. Really sturdy and did the trick. However, 3.5 months later the kickstand is loose and swinging all over the place and is not fit for purpose. Whilst I don't expect these things to last years, I do expect them to work longer than a few months.

 have been great and have said they'll issue a refund upon return of the item.

reviews.name: Alice
reviews.reviewTitle: Great idea but no suitable for long term use
reviews.review: I really liked the idea behind this phone stand and when I bought it 10 months ago was showing it off to everyone. I liked that it gave me extra security holding the phone, the magnet was great to attach to my dashboard (I already had a Yoshi car vent holder so haven't used the bit provided from this product) and it worked really well as a stand in both portrait and landscape. The adhesive was really secure and the colour was pretty. Unfortunately after the first month I found that the outer ring started to become less stiff and wouldn't hold the weight of the phone so much and by this point the rose gold layer was noticeable scratched. Over time this degenerated to the point where the rings will come away from the back of the phone about 30 degrees just due to gravity (or without intending to move them). About two days ago any friction on the outer ring completely lapsed and the whole thing just dangles and noisely clatters around. I've finally accepted it's beyond the end of its life and won't be purchasing another one. It's such a shame there wasn't a way to tighten up the connections over time. Overall not worth the .oney as this statt d to be an issue after only a month of use and I just persevered with it.

reviews.name: Bella
reviews.reviewTitle: Great phone stand, ring holder. Good quality
reviews.review:
I bought this to help with keeping phone upright when on zoom calls, watching videos etc. I have a case with appliqu√©s on the back so had to put it on off centre it still works and is a great quality stand. It does add a bit of bulk to the phone (I run so may be tight in some pockets) but I can take the cover off If I need too.

It‚Äôs comfortable to hold and I‚Äôm very happy with the item.

reviews.name: Patrick S.
reviews.review: I‚Äôve had enough ring pops in my to know when they‚Äôve been sucked on before üòÇ The package I received had all but a few that tasted like they were licked on then repackaged and sold smh. First and last buy for me personally.

reviews.name: Anthony O.
reviews.reviewTitle: üòäAMAZING DELIVERY AT AN AMAZING PRICE VALUEüòä
reviews.review: I was ecstatic with the courteous delivery and I was truly amazedü§©
